title: Pret Club 试用：首月仅 £5
description: Join Pret Club for endless coffee for £5 in the first month.
description_zh: 加入 Pret Club 订阅，首月仅需 £5 即可每日享受最多五杯饮品。

title: Nando's Rewards 免费鸡翅
title_zh: Nando's Rewards：首次兑换免费鸡翅
description: Earn your first reward faster with the new Nando's Rewards app.
description_zh: 注册 Nando's Rewards 并完成首次消费即可解锁免费 PERi-PERi 鸡翅兑换。

title: Tesco Clubcard：烘培区买一赠一
title_zh: Tesco Clubcard 烘焙产品买一赠一
description: Clubcard price on selected in-store bakery treats, buy one get one free.
description_zh: 使用 Tesco Clubcard 在门店购买指定烘焙点心享受买一赠一优惠。

title: Paperchase Treat Me 会员生日礼
title_zh: Paperchase Treat Me：生日免费礼物
description: Treat Me members get a £5 voucher to spend during their birthday month.
description_zh: 加入 Paperchase Treat Me 会员，生日月即可获得 £5 礼品卡用于门店消费。

title: Yo! Sushi Blue Light Card 优惠
title_zh: Yo! Sushi Blue Light Card 会员 20% 折扣
description: Blue Light Card holders save 20% off the bill Monday to Thursday.
description_zh: 出示 Blue Light Card 在 Yo! Sushi 周一至周四可享受整单 8 折优惠。

title: Vue Cinemas 学生票 £5.99
description: Vue student tickets from £5.99 with valid student ID, available nationwide.
description_zh: 出示学生证在 Vue Cinemas 购票，精选场次学生票仅 £5.99 起。
